body_text:
Need help identifying yaoi manga with three brothers living together after their parents died There are three brothers who live together after they lose their parents. They do not have enough money so they make a dating office/place/bar or something along the lines of that.

The oldest brother is the brainy smart kind of guy so he does all of the thinking and takes care of them (like a father).
The middle one is the shy type, is good at cooking and is very kind and sweet (like a mother).
The youngest is the cutest. He is very spoiled and looks like a girl (very pretty) so they make him crossdress to trick people.

If I remember correctly, the plot was that the two older brothers start falling for the youngest one. It's a Yaoi or a Shounen Ai manga that I read a year or two ago and there were only two volumes of it.
All help will be appreciated.
